objects.text:
25G PROTEIN PER SERVING • 63 SERVINGS • 5LB CONTAINER
NON-GMO & GLUTEN FREE • GMP COMPLIANT

product_details.description: Undenatured, Whey Protein Concentrate 5LBS of Chocolate Flavored Whey Protein Concentrate Per Bottle Delicious Milk Chocolate Flavored Whey Protein Concentrate Non-GMO & Gluten Free Made in a GMP Compliant, FDA Registered Facility Brand - Nutricost ** Flavor - Chocolate ** Servings per Container - 63 ** Item Weight - 5.7 Pounds ** Material Type Free - Gluten Free **

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, professional design meant to promote a health supplement product. The layout is vertically oriented with a smooth, modern background combining gradient blue and white waves, complemented by subtle decorative circles. A large product image is centrally aligned, making it the focal point. Above it, the banner includes a prominent title (`heading`), a smaller subtitle (`subheading`), and brand name (`brand`) layered sequentially for hierarchy. Below the image, a highlighted information section (`description`) outlines key features. A price label (`price_label`) and callout (`price`) are followed by a prominent call-to-action (`cta`). The colors used support clarity and brand attention.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #0056b3
- Accent Orange: #FF9800
- White: #FFFFFF
- Charcoal Text: #212121
- Light Beige: #F5ECD6 (background base hue)
- Price Highlight Blue: #003580
product_color: The product image utilizes a bold and dynamic color palette dominated by deep blue (#0054A6), vibrant orange (#F7941D), rich chocolate brown (#4B2E22), and clean white (#FFFFFF). These colors blend cohesively, enhancing the brand’s energetic and health-conscious image. Deep blue is used prominently for the lid and accent text, conveying trust and professionalism, while the orange swoosh adds energy and contrast. Chocolate brown at the bottom highlights the milk chocolate flavor. The white background ensures clarity and allows the text and visuals to pop. This palette can effectively be used in an advertisement banner to convey vibrancy, strength, and dietary focus.
